/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful contrast to the colorful buildings. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. The image is taken during the day, and the sunlight illuminates the scene, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the buildings and the street.
